content: I think I'll prioritize finding a place with a shorter commute to work, since I've learned that time is valuable in this city. But I'll also keep an eye out for apartments that are close to areas I'm interested in, like Harajuku or Shibuya. Maybe I can find a place that offers a good balance between the two. Do you think I should also consider factors like the age and condition of the building, or the availability of amenities like a gym or community space?
